opis: KUĆA, PRODAJA, ISTRA, SELINA, 250 m2, 5-sobna Prodaje se kamena kuća s bazenom u Istri površine 250 m2 te okućnice 500 m2. Kuća se nalazi u naselju Selina. Kuća je katnica (prizemlje i prvi kat) te je kompletno renovirana 2023. godine. Sastoji se od: PRIZEMLJE: dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, spavaća soba s kupaonicom, odvojeni wc, natkrivena terasa KAT: dvije spavaće sobe, dvije kupaonice, hodnik. POMOĆNI OBJEKT: bazen veličine 8x4m, natkrivena terasa s ljetnom kuhinjom i roštiljem, odvojeni wc te zasebna spavaća soba sa svojom kupaonicom. Kuća je kompletno renovirana po najvišim standardima od keramike, kompletnih vodovodnih i električnih instalacija. Svi objekti su klimatizirani te je ugrađeno podno grijanje i video nadzor.. Kuća posjeduje 3 natkrivena parkirna mjesta. Kuća zbog svog koncepta i sjajne lokacije idealna je za investiciju. Kuća se prodaje kompletno namještena. Vlasništvo uredno. Kuća posjeduje Uporabnu dozvolu, mogućnost kupnje putem kredita. HOUSE, FOR SALE, ISTRIA, SELINA, 250 m², 5-room Stone house with pool for sale in Istria, with a living area of 250 m² and a 500 m² yard. The house is located in the village of Selina. It’s a two-story house (ground floor and first floor), fully renovated in 2023. The layout is as follows: GROUND FLOOR: living room with kitchen and dining area, bedroom with en-suite bathroom, separate toilet, covered terrace FIRST FLOOR: two bedrooms, two bathrooms, hallway ANNEX: 8x4m pool, covered terrace with summer kitchen and barbecue, separate toilet, and a separate bedroom with its own bathroom The house has been completely renovated to the highest standards, including ceramics, complete plumbing and electrical installations. All buildings are air-conditioned, with underfloor heating and video surveillance installed. There are 3 covered parking spaces. Thanks to its layout and excellent location, the house is ideal as an investment. The house is being sold fully furnished. Ownership is clean. The house has a usage permit and is eligible for mortgage purchase. ID KOD AGENCIJE: 462 Vlaho Veneti Agent s licencom Mob: 098 166 9011 E-mail: vlaho@kavalir.hr www.kavalir.hr
